post.body: Twitter 'search" now seems to be working...
It snowed the other day & left ice/snow on the ground, flurries last night & now RAIN! Should be good 4 sum slippin' & slidin'
It's also pouring rain in Brooklyn right now.
Cold & windy, but I don't have 2 go out 2day, unless UPS does not come w p/u my return pkge to T-Mobile. Then will scurry 2 find drop box.
Up early as usual, using ipod so as not to disturb my neighbor, but I am banging the keys so hard, he's probably pretty bothered anyway.
Intelligent & outrageous, self reliant & alone, resourceful & courageous, meeting the world on its own terms & refusing 2b defeated. Becky!
Counseling clients late-ish on a Sunday whilst balancing girls girls girls on the phone. Blissfully self-employed. Totally joyful about it!
just got back from the Bklyn boonies: Red Hook. Love brisk days in the boro & shopping storefronts that r warm & have cool finds inside.
Figured out how to load my brand new ipod (it took quite awhile!)--'twas a present from la familia, would never buy one myself....
Up way 2 freakin early! Have been working 4 two hours. Updating replacement Blackberry, corresponding with equally as early clients, etc.
DEALS @ Idlewild Books, NYC: http://tinyurl.com/6fvx47 & http://tinyurl.com/4ho42c
Anyone in NYC need a few extra sheckels? A client needs flyers distrubted 4 hrs/day from today 'til x-mas near Union Sq. DM 4 deets. Thx.
Hey Idlewild Books is in DailyCandy today: http://tinyurl.com/6fvx47
At an Internet Cafe in Hell's Kitchen waiting for my next appointment.
Up & adam. My day is 6 a.m. until ????
Too busy to twitter at all today,, so am tweeting goodnight.
Working for hours already so I can play tonight.
so much to do, don't really know where to start...
TONIGHT: Calling Bklyn women 4 Ladies Night, 6-11pm @ Tini Wine Bar, 414 Van Brunt, Bklyn (www.tiniwinebar.com). Pls DM me4 more info. Thx.
Up and like everyone else, havig trouble getting motivated on this dreary day.
